StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetProgramCriteriaWaiver]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ProgramID int = NULL, @E.ec.veDate date.me = NULL AS
SELECT P.PROGRAM_ID, P.PROGRAM_CODE, CONVERT(varchar(11), PC.PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE, 106) AS EFFECTIVE_DATE, PCW.WAIVER_ID, COALESCE(C.WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE, COALESCE(T.WAIVER_TYPE_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS WAIVER_TYPE_CODE, COALESCE(L.WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE FROM PROGRAM P INNER JOIN PROGRAM_CRITERIA PC ON (P.PROGRAM_ID = PC.PROGRAM_ID AND PC.PROGRAM_ID = COALESCE(@ProgramID, PC.PROGRAM_ID) AND P.STATUS = CASE WHEN @ProgramID IS NOT NULL THEN P.STATUS ELSE 'A' END AND PC.PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE = COALESCE(@E.ec.veDate, (SELECT MAX(PC1.PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE) FROM PROGRAM_CRITERIA PC1 WHERE PC1.PROGRAM_ID = PC.PROGRAM_ID))) LEFT OUTER JOIN PROGRAM_CRITERIA_WAIVER PCW ON (PC.PROGRAM_ID = PCW.PROGRAM_ID AND PC.PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE = PCW.PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE) LEFT OUTER JOIN WAIVER W ON PCW.WAIVER_ID = W.WAIVER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAIVER_CATEGORY C ON W.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID = C.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAIVER_TYPE T ON W.WAIVER_TYPE_ID = T.WAIVER_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAIVER_LEVEL L ON W.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID = L.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID ORDER BY P.PROGRAM_CODE, C.WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE, T.WAIVER_TYPE_CODE, L.WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE, PCW.WAIVER_ID
